post.excerpt: Julia Guerra, director and co-founder of Leme, on a technical visit to the Na Paz project, part of the Integrated Program for Violence Prevention and Reduction of the Government of the State of Ceará (PreVio).
post.title: PreVio: Supesp board accompanies visit by technicians from the Leme Laboratory and the University of Chicago.
